TopicTitle: F9R or Falcon 9 1.1 1.2 payload divevery and 1 stage landing challenge

Articles.Content:
Recreate the F9R or Falcon 9 launches by launching and landing the first stage of the Falcon 9.

   RULES:

  1. Have fun
  2. you cannot use laztech falcon 9 (mod are allow but not this one)
  3. For the Falcon 9 you have to get the second stage into orbit and as an optional challenge deliver a payload to orbit
  4. screenshots of pre-launch, in flight, separation, 1 stage landing, and second stage orbit for falcon 9 and a screenshot of your payload being delivered (if your doing that part)
  5. be nice and provide a download and/or mod list if you want
  6. you can use burn together to create the Falcon Heavy

Good luck and Have fun
